v8:item.v8:content: The payment currency specified in the contract.
The price type that is automatically added to the sales documents based on this contract.
The price type that is automatically added to the purchase documents based on this contract.
The discount type that is automatically added to the sales documents based on this contract.
The person in the counterparty company responsible for the contract.
The department responsible for the contract.
The user who created the contract.
Payment method: electronic, cash or not defined
The period from the date of the invoice
